    • Constructor Detail

      • OfficeWriter

        public OfficeWriter(java.lang.String mimeType,
                    java.util.Locale useLocale,
                    boolean ignoreMissingLinkedWorkbooks,
                    java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String commentAuthor,
                    int commentWidth,
                    int commentHeight,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    java.lang.String encryptAlgorithm,
                    java.lang.String hashAlgorithm,
                    java.lang.String encryptMode,
                    java.lang.String chainMode,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
             throws InvalidWriterConfigurationException
        Creates a new writer for office documents given a mime type (cf. https://tika.apache.org/1.13/formats.html#Full_list_of_Supported_Formats)
        Parameters:
        mimeType - Mime Type of the office document
        useLocale - Locale to be used to evaluate cells
        ignoreMissingLinkedWorkbooks - if true then missing linked workbooks are ignored during writing, if false then missing linked workbooks are not ignored and need to be present
        fileName - filename of the document without path
        commentAuthor - default author for comments
        commentWidth - default width for comments
        commentHeight - default height for comments
        password - password for encryption. Set to null for no encryption.
        encryptAlgorithm - Encryption algorithm (support depends upon writer, see documentation there). It is strongly recommended to do an in-depth analysis which algorithm to select to provide optimal security
        hashAlgorithm - Hash algorithm (support depends upon writer, see documentation there). It is strongly recommended to do an in-depth analysis which algorithm to select to provide optimal security
        encryptMode - Encrypt mode (support depends upon writer, see documentation there). It is strongly recommended to do an in-depth analysis which algorithm to select to provide optimal security
        chainMode - Chain mode (support depends upon writer, see documentation there). It is strongly recommended to do an in-depth analysis which algorithm to select to provide optimal security
        metadata - to write with the document. Please consult documentation of the write to see which attribute names and values are supported
        Throws:
        InvalidWriterConfigurationException - in case format is not supported or encryption algorithm is wrongly specified

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(java.io.OutputStream oStream,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.InputStream> linkedWorkbooks,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> linkedWorkbooksPasswords)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   InvalidWriterConfigurationException,
                   FormatNotUnderstoodException,
                   java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Creates a new office document
        Parameters:
        oStream - OutputStream where the Workbook should be written when calling finalizeWrite
        linkedWorkbooks - linked workbooks that are already existing and linked to this document. Only if supported by the format
        linkedWorkbooksPasswords - a map of passwords and linkedworkbooks. The key is the filename without path of the linkedworkbook and the value is the password
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue with the OutputStream
        InvalidWriterConfigurationException - in case no proper writer has been instantiated
        FormatNotUnderstoodException - in case one of the linked workbooks has an invalid format
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.Object o)
           throws ObjectNotSupportedException,
                  InvalidWriterConfigurationException,
                  InvalidCellSpecificationException
        Writes an object to the office document. Note the type of object highly depends on the underlying writer. E.g. for SpreadSheet-based writers it is of class SpreadSheetCellDAO
        Parameters:
        o - object
        Throws:
        ObjectNotSupportedException - in case the underlying writer cannot handle this type of object
        InvalidWriterConfigurationException - in case no proper writer has been instantiated
        InvalidCellSpecificationException - in case the specification of the cell is incorrect

      • finalizeWrite

        public void finalizeWrite()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          InvalidWriterConfigurationException,
                          java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Writes the document in-memory representation to the OutputStream. Aferwards, it closes all related workbooks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of issues writing.
        InvalidWriterConfigurationException - in case no proper writer has been instantiated
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - in case of issues of writing encrypted documents
